name: Keep quiet
changelog: Added link to the French version of the app
description:
You can ask your assistant to stop replying to your voice commands until you ask it to talk to you again.

Some examples:

- "Be quiet" -> Snips ignores all intents except the one to ask it to talk again.
- "Talk again" -> Snips listens to all intents again that are enabled by default.
- "Disable the RepeatAction intent" -> Snips disables the RepeatAction intent.
- "Enable the FlipCoin intent" -> Snips enables the FlipCoin intent.

To be able to use this app, you need Snips 1.1.2 (0.62.3).

For disabling and enabling intents, the `snips-injection` service should be running, because the names of the installed intents are injected in the vocabulary of Snips.

More information can be found on the GitHub page of the actions code: https://github.com/koenvervloesem/snips-app-keep-quiet

If you have some suggestions for improvements, such as new training examples or new functionality, or if you found a bug, feel free to contact me at koen@vervloesem.eu and I'll be happy to add or correct it. And if you like my app, please rate it :-)

This app also exists in:

- French: https://console.snips.ai/store/fr/skill_8lyE0KYQ1zr
- German: https://console.snips.ai/store/de/skill_zmmENzQnqaQ
